casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

February 22, 2007

[Cite as 02/22/2007 Case Announcements, 2007-0hio-709.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2006-1858. Reihard v. Trumbull Cardiovascular Care, Inc.

Trumbull App. No. 2005-T-0073, 2006-0hio-4312. This cause is pending before the court on appellants’ motion for reconsideration. Upon consideration of appellee’s motion to strike motion for reconsideration,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.

It is further ordered, sua sponte, that appellee may file a memorandum opposing the motion for reconsideration within seven days from the date of this entry.
